description: Typinator is a program used to increase users' typing efficiency. It allows users to type shortcuts instead of whole sentences, which is especially helpful when repeatedly typing the same sentence or phrase. Typinator also serves as an AutoCorrection tool for misspellings.
NOTE: TAB files are similar to the more common .TYSET file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .tab file in Microsoft Notepad 11
images.caption: TAB file open in Microsoft Notepad 11
